item.title: About this blog
item.description: Hello there, my name is Johnny. I started this blog due to the reasons below: Dan Luu has a great blog and his narrative is interesting to me, I figured that’s a good way to write about the rambling thoughts that I sometimes find important to keep track of, or just to follow up on the ramblings that I find worthy. I find myself ramble on a lot about a variety of stuff to people, or myself, with a blog I can share all these ramblings.

item.title: PM Types
